TopicTitle: Allow kerbals to walk around on the decks of ships and on the wings of planes

Articles.Content: We've all been there, a kerbals falls out of their seat on a ship, and they can't move, and they rag doll on the ground as if paralyzed. Also, being able to walk around on planes and rovers would make for some easy repairs with KÄS / KIS and some really cool screenshots. So what do you all think?
I agree sometimes I use LLL and it get very annoying

I've never been there.

 

I don't build ships and my kerbals can walk around on plane wings just fine and no reason they can't walk on big enough rovers. 

 

I'm not sure what this is requesting.

Are you requesting a just cause 3-esque wing walking system, where a kerbal can walk on the wing of an in-atmo flying craft? I don't think that's happening. Also, I have to agree with Alshain on this. There have also been craft where interactable interiors are made as well as a five layer or so maze.
